TestCase.name: testScanTable_SetExchangeAsBatch
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM t t1, t t2 WHERE t1.a = t2.a AND t1.b > 10 AND t2.c LIKE 'Test%'

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], a0=[$3], b0=[$4], c0=[$5]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=($0, $3), >($1, 10), LIKE($5, 'Test%'))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[t]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[t]])

NestedLoopJoin(where=[=(a, a0)], join=[a, b, c, a0, b0, c0], joinType=[InnerJoin], build=[right], singleRow=[false]) :- Exchange(distribution=[any], exchange_mode=[BATCH]) : +- Calc(select=[a, b, c], where=[>(b, 10)]) : +- BoundedDataStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[broadcast]) +- Calc(select=[a, b, c], where=[LIKE(c, 'Test%')]) +- BoundedDataStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testReusedNodeIsBarrierNode
TestCase.Resource: WITH r AS (SELECT c, SUM(a) a, SUM(b) b FROM x GROUP BY c) SELECT * FROM r r1, r r2 WHERE r1.a = r2.b AND r2.a > 1

LogicalProject(c=[$0], a=[$1], b=[$2], c0=[$3], a0=[$4], b0=[$5]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=(CAST($1):BIGINT, $5), >($4, 1))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], a=[SUM($1)], b=[SUM($2)]) : +- LogicalProject(c=[$2], a=[$0], b=[$1]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a, b, c]]]]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], a=[SUM($1)], b=[SUM($2)]) +- LogicalProject(c=[$2], a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a, b, c]]]])

Calc(select=[c, a, b, c0, a1, b0]) +- NestedLoopJoin(where=[=(a0, b0)], join=[c, a, b, a0, c0, a1, b0], joinType=[InnerJoin], build=[right], singleRow=[false]) :- Exchange(distribution=[any], exchange_mode=[BATCH]) : +- Calc(select=[c, a, b, CAST(a) AS a0]) : +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[c], select=[c, Final_SUM(sum$0) AS a, Final_SUM(sum$1) AS b], reuse_id=[1]) : +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[c]]) : +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[c], select=[c, Partial_SUM(a) AS sum$0, Partial_SUM(b) AS sum$1]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a, b, c]]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[broadcast]) +- Calc(select=[c, a, b], where=[>(a, 1)]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])

TestCase.name: testReuseSubPlan_AddExchangeAsBatch_HashJoin
TestCase.Resource: WITH r AS (SELECT a FROM x LIMIT 10) SELECT r1.a FROM r r1, r r2 WHERE r1.a = r2.a

LogicalProject(a=[$0]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, $1)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalSort(fetch=[10]) : +- LogicalProject(a=[$0]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a, b, c]]]]) +- LogicalSort(fetch=[10]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a, b, c]]]])

Calc(select=[a]) +- HashJoin(where=[=(a, a0)], join=[a, a0], joinType=[InnerJoin], isBroadcast=[true], build=[right]) :- TableSourceScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a], limit=10]]], fields=[a]) +- Exchange(distribution=[broadcast]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a], limit=10]]], fields=[a])

TestCase.name: testReuseSubPlan_AddExchangeAsBatch_NestedLoopJoin
TestCase.Resource: WITH r AS (SELECT a FROM x LIMIT 10) SELECT r1.a FROM r r1, r r2 WHERE r1.a = r2.a

LogicalProject(a=[$0]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, $1)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalSort(fetch=[10]) : +- LogicalProject(a=[$0]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a, b, c]]]]) +- LogicalSort(fetch=[10]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a, b, c]]]])

Calc(select=[a]) +- NestedLoopJoin(where=[=(a, a0)], join=[a, a0], joinType=[InnerJoin], build=[left], singleRow=[false]) :- Exchange(distribution=[broadcast]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a], limit=10]]], fields=[a]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a], limit=10]]], fields=[a])

TestCase.name: testReuseSubPlan_SetExchangeAsBatch
TestCase.Resource: WITH t AS (SELECT x.a AS a, x.b AS b, y.d AS d, y.e AS e FROM x, y WHERE x.a = y.d) SELECT t1.*, t2.* FROM t t1, t t2 WHERE t1.b = t2.e AND t1.a < 10 AND t2.a > 5

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], d=[$2], e=[$3], a0=[$4], b0=[$5], d0=[$6], e0=[$7]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=($1, $7), <($0, 10), >($4, 5))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], d=[$3], e=[$4]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, $3)]) : +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) : :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a, b, c]]]]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[y, source: [selectedFields=[d, e, f]]]]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], d=[$3], e=[$4]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, $3)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a, b, c]]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[y, source: [selectedFields=[d, e, f]]]])

HashJoin(where=[=(b, e0)], join=[a, b, d, e, a0, b0, d0, e0], joinType=[InnerJoin], build=[left]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) : +- HashJoin(where=[=(a, d)], join=[a, b, d, e], joinType=[InnerJoin], build=[left]) : :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : : +- Calc(select=[a, b], where=[<(a, 10)]) : : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a, b]]]], fields=[a, b], reuse_id=[1]) : +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]], reuse_id=[2]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[y, source: [selectedFields=[d, e]]]], fields=[d, e]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[e]], exchange_mode=[BATCH]) +- HashJoin(where=[=(a, d)], join=[a, b, d, e], joinType=[InnerJoin], build=[left]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- Calc(select=[a, b], where=[>(a, 5)]) : +- Reused(reference_id=[1]) +- Reused(reference_id=[2])

TestCase.name: testScanTable_AddExchangeAsBatch_HashJoin
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM t INTERSECT SELECT * FROM t
LogicalIntersect(all=[false]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[t]]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[t]])

HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[a, b, c], select=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a, b, c]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[a, b, c], select=[a, b, c]) +- HashSemiJoin(where=[AND(OR(=(a, a0), AND(IS NULL(a), IS NULL(a0))), OR(=(b, b0), AND(IS NULL(b), IS NULL(b0))), OR(=(c, c0), AND(IS NULL(c), IS NULL(c0))))], join=[a, b, c], joinType=[LeftSemiJoin], isBroadcast=[true], build=[right]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a, b, c]], exchange_mode=[BATCH]) : +- BoundedDataStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[broadcast]) +- BoundedDataStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testScanTable_AddExchangeAsBatch_NestedLoopJoin
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM t t1, t t2 WHERE t1.a = t2.b

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], a0=[$3], b0=[$4], c0=[$5]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=(CAST($0):BIGINT, $4)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[t]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[t]])

Calc(select=[a, b, c, a1, b0, c0]) +- HashJoin(where=[=(a0, b0)], join=[a, b, c, a0, a1, b0, c0], joinType=[InnerJoin], isBroadcast=[true], build=[right]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a0]], exchange_mode=[BATCH]) : +- Calc(select=[a, b, c, CAST(a) AS a0]) : +- BoundedDataStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[broadcast]) +- BoundedDataStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testReuseSubPlan_AddExchangeAsBatch_BuildLeftSemiHashJoin
TestCase.Resource: WITH r AS (SELECT a, b FROM x LIMIT 10) SELECT r1.a, r2.b FROM x r1, (SELECT a, b FROM r WHERE a in (select a from x where b > 5)) r2 WHERE r1.a = r2.a and r1.b = 5

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$4]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=($0, $3), =($1, 5))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a, b, c]]]]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[IN($0, { LogicalProject(a=[$0]) LogicalFilter(condition=[>($1, 5)]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a, b, c]]]]) })]) +- LogicalSort(fetch=[10]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a, b, c]]]])

Calc(select=[a, b]) +- HashJoin(where=[=(a, a0)], join=[a, a0, b], joinType=[InnerJoin], build=[left]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- Calc(select=[a], where=[=(b, 5)]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a, b]]]], fields=[a, b], reuse_id=[1]) +- HashSemiJoin(where=[=(a, a0)], join=[a, b], joinType=[LeftSemiJoin], build=[left]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a, b], limit=10]]], fields=[a, b]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- Calc(select=[a], where=[>(b, 5)]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])
